item.title: Overflowing skip & fly tipping, 6th August
item.description:
Commercial skip is being used for domestic waste & is overflowing. Residents in flats do not have waste disposal facilities so using skip. Also now attracting fly tipping. This is an ongoing issue which will clearly continue until skip removed & residents are provided with a proper waste facility.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 253, Beckenham Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Untaxed camper van, 6th August
item.description:
D474 UV0 Camper van. Been here for years. Registered as SORN. This is not a private space. Opposite 1 Wordsworth Road, DA16 3NT
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wordsworth Road, Falconwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Same streets, 6th August
item.description:
Sorry This mess everyday the bring horse and they keep shut on the streets these people very crazy and dangerous can you report these people

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clarendon Mews, Paddington, London

item.title: FlyTipping, 6th August
item.description:
Hi Team - Someone has flytipped boxes in the street, outside our flats carpark entrance. Photo of rubbish attached above. We have a photo of the person that done it, including his number plate, which can be provided if required.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bexley Lane, Crayford, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on door and graffiti vinyl covering whole window of ex-Baccarat, 68 High Street Beckenham, 6th August
item.description:
Graffiti on door and graffiti vinyl covering whole window of ex-Baccarat, 68 High Street Beckenham. Posted Monday, reported by fms as fixed on Tuesday, but it isn't. This is the second time a problem reported has been immediately marked as fixed recently when it blatantly isn't - is there a technical problem with fms? The 'fixed' items block any comment...

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins still out on the street, 6th August
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Colberg Place, Hackney, London

item.title: Water flowing out of the pavement in two places., 6th August
item.description:
In two places, water is flowing out of cracks in the pavement at a high force. It is causing flooding down Stumps Hill Lane and Southend Road. It looks like a wide river!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southend Road, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On Cumberland Market in the corner where you walk through to the Nick Collins Hall., 6th August
item.description:
The manhole is significantly raised and is a real trip hazard for passing pedestrians. Especially in the dark as you cannot see it as you walk through from Robert Street to Cumberland Market. At the point of the anti cycling barriers.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cumberland Market, Fitzrovia, London
Report on FixMyStreet
